offer.title: Lifestyle Apparel Special
offer.disclaimer: Valid only at BMW of Denver Downtown.

offer.title: Cabin Air Filter Special
offer.details: Includes 3-series cabin air filter. Reg price $55.95 + tax
offer.disclaimer: Must be presented at time of write-up. Only applicable to 3-series cabin filter.  Some models may be slightly higher. Not valid with any other offers or in-store specials. Does not include sales tax and hazardous waste disposal fees. Not retroactive. No cash value. See dealer for details. Limit one coupon per person. Coupon does not apply to prior purchases. Void where prohibited. See your service professional at BMW of Denver Downtown for details.

offer.title: Wiper Special
offer.details: Includes set of 2 wiper blades. Reg. price $39.95 + tax.
offer.disclaimer: Valid only at BMW of Denver Downtown. Applies to 3-series models. BMW wiper blades only. Please present coupon when service order is written. Taxes not included. Not valid in conjunction with other coupons or discounts. See your service professional at BMW of Denver Downtown for details.

offer.title: Battery Special
offer.details: Includes installation and 90 minute programming. Reg. price $499 + tax
offer.disclaimer: Valid only at BMW of Denver Downtown. Please present coupon when service order is written. Taxes and hazardous waste disposal fees extra. Not valid in conjunction with other coupons or discounts. See your service professional at BMW of Denver Downtown for details.

offer.title: Brake Special
offer.details: Includes front or rear brake pads with installation.
offer.disclaimer: Must be presented at time of write-up. $250 maximum discount. Not valid with any other offers or in-store specials. Does not include sales tax and hazardous waste disposal fees. Not retroactive. No cash value. See dealer for details. Limit one coupon per person. Coupon does not apply to prior purchases. Void where prohibited. See your service professional at BMW of Denver Downtown for details.

offer.title: Service Your Way
offer.disclaimer: Valid only at BMW of Denver Downtown. $250 maximum savings. Please present coupon when service order is written. Taxes and hazardous waste disposal fees extra. Not valid in conjunction with other coupons or discounts (oil change, drains or refill services). Other restrictions may apply.  Limit one coupon per VIN #. See your service professional at BMW of Denver Downtown for details.

offer.title: Alignment Special

offer.disclaimer: Coupon not valid with any other offer. Must present coupon at time of purchase. Limit one coupon per person. Coupon does not apply to prior purchases. Other Restrictions may apply. Dealer not responsible for seized suspension components which could result in additional cost to customer it alignment cannot be adjusted.
